articles.title: Harvard-designed 'backpacks' turn immune cells into better cancer killers - FierceBiotech
articles.description: Harvard scientists packed interferon gamma into little "backpacks" that can latch onto immune cells called macrophages and coax them into an anti-tumor state.

articles.title: Pandemic profiting: Vaccines and PPE on the dark web - Medical Xpress
